title: Alphabet Inc. Cl A stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
text:
Shares of Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 4.60% to $147.68 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.63% to 5,149.42 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.20% to 38,790.43. Alphabet Inc. Cl A closed $6.10 short of its 52-week high ($153.78), which the company reached on January 29th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Monday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rose 0.22% to $417.32, Amazon.com Inc. 
        AMZN,
        +0.31%
       rose 0.03% to $174.48, and Meta Platforms Inc. 
        META,
        -1.68%
       rose 2.66% to $496.98. Trading volume (68.9 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 31.9 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The S&P 500 has marched higher by nearly 30% over the past five months, prompting even bullish market strategists to entertain, or even welcome, the prospect of a “healthy” correction.
